page.title: 08HOME LIFE
page.content: I have interviewed my Gran who lives in{5 Westwood Drive.}She preferred life as it was a few years ago because it was much slower and people did not rush around as much as they do today. She also told me that there was not so much traffic on the roads. She could remember the celebrations and parties at the end of the war in 1945 clearly. She said she will remember recovering from an operation when she looks back on 1985. I have interviewed Mrs Rilot who is 84 years old and lives in{Stones' Place. She told me that she became interested in politics in 1925. She remembered 1945 because it was the end of the second world war. 1965 was not a good year because her husband died. She has seen many changes in transport, the amount of money people spend and how people entertain themselves. .
